Naming/InclusiveLanguage.description:
Description

Recommend the use of inclusive language instead of problematic terms.
Naming/InclusiveLanguage.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

CheckIdentifiers: True (type: bool)
CheckConstants: True (type: bool)
CheckVariables: True (type: bool)
CheckStrings: False (type: bool)
CheckSymbols: True (type: bool)
CheckComments: True (type: bool)
CheckFilepaths: True (type: bool)
FlaggedTerms: {'whitelist': {'Regex': '/white[-_\\s]?list/', 'Suggestions': ['allowlist', 'permit']}, 'blacklist': {'Regex': '/black[-_\\s]?list/', 'Suggestions': ['denylist', 'block']}, 'slave': {'WholeWord': True, 'Suggestions': ['replica', 'secondary', 'follower']}} (type: dict)
